New Records: Jaren Jackson Jr. scored 39 points, his highest this season.
Scotty Pippen Jr. recorded his first career triple-double with 11 points, 11 assists, and 10 rebounds.
Key Match Events: With 3:50 left in the third quarter, Jaren Jackson Jr. and Jonas Valanciunas had a physical altercation leading to double-technicals.
Memphis maintained a lead of at least 20 points through most of the second half.
Pre-Game Insights: The Wizards were dealing with injuries, leading to a young lineup and 13 turnovers in the first half.
Grizzlies coach Brian Keefe emphasized defensive communication throughout the game.
Post-Match Reflections: Memphis extended their winning streak to four in five games.
Wizards coach Brian Keefe noted the Grizzlies' physicality and pace as key factors in their win.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Memphis continues to lead the league in points in the paint, averaging 60 per game.
The game was followed by a ad featuring Yeti products.
Others: The article includes a 'Key stat' about the Grizzlies' dominance inside the paint.
